name: S-Engine for Turing

screenshots.caption: Comparison between Standard GUI and S-Engine GUI

short_description: The S-Engine is an alternative skinnable GUI (Graphical User Interface) for the Turing programming language. The S-Engine uses image manipulation to create modern looking buttons and GUI objects. (Turing 4.0.4c or higher is required)
